# jbot-ai Development Workspace

Local development environment for fine-tuning a language model using personal writings, emails, and text messages as training data.

## Project Overview

This project provides a complete pipeline for:
- Collecting and processing personal text data (emails, messages, writings)
- Preparing data for model fine-tuning
- Fine-tuning open-source language models locally
- Evaluating and testing the custom model

## Setup Instructions

1. Install Python 3.10+ and required dependencies
2. Configure your data sources in `config/sources.yaml`
3. Use data processing scripts to prepare training data
4. Run fine-tuning pipeline with your preferred model

See README.md for detailed instructions.
